Code: EXEC SQL SELECT NUM_APOLICE, NRENDOS, NUM_ITEM, OCORHIST, RAMOFR, MODALIFR, COD_COBERTURA, IMP_SEGURADA_IX, PRM_TARIFARIO_IX, fator_multiplica FROM seguros.v1coberapol WHERE num_apolice = :NUM_APOLICE AND nrendos = :NRENDOS AND num_item = :NUM_ITEM AND ramofr = :RAMOFR AND ocorhist = :OCORHIST AND cod_cobertura = :COD_COBERTURA END SQL
